alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 15 at 4:04PM MDT until April 15 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... An Ice Jam Break in... Northwestern Phillips County in northeastern Montana... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 404 PM MDT, gauge reports indicated an ice jam on the Milk 2 miles west of Dodson broke causing flash flooding downstream. HAZARD...Flash flooding from an ice jam. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flooding of areas near the ice jam. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Dodson. This includes the following streams and drainages... Milk Creek, Assiniboine Creek, Cow Creek, Peoples Creek, Dodson Creek, Milk River and Spring Coulee. The flood wave is moving down the Milk from Dodson to Wagner. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
